Title: Prohibits the use of toxic metals in electronic cigarettes and requires the department of health to study the long term health effects of electronic cigarette users
Summary: Prohibits the use of toxic metals in electronic cigarettes, requires disclosure of the materials used in the hardware of electronic cigarettes and requires the department of health to study the long term health effects of electronic cigarette users.
LawCode: Add ยง1399-gg-1, amd ยง206, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the use of toxic metals in electronic cigarettes and requiring the department of health to study the long term health effects of electronic cigarette users
